bank.title: MAT 106 - Number Systems and Operations - CheckIt Bank

outcome.title: Ancient Numeration Systems
outcome.description: I can convert the ancient Roman/Babylonian/Egyptian numeration systems to modern Hindu-Arabic base ten, and vice versa.

outcome.title: Base-b Addition and Subtraction Algorithms
outcome.description: I can compute addition and subtraction of multi-digit base-b whole numbers using non-standard addition and subtraction algorithms.

outcome.title: Properties of Addition and Multiplication
outcome.description: I can identify uses of the associative, commutative, identity, zero product, and distributive properties of addition and multiplication.

outcome.title: Generating Appropriate Word Problems
outcome.description: I can generate elementary word problems most suitable for each of the mental models of addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

outcome.title: Base-b Multiplication Algorithms
outcome.description: I can compute multiplication of multi-digit base-b whole numbers using non-standard multiplication algorithms.

outcome.title: Long Division Algorithms
outcome.description: I can compute the quotient of two whole or decimal numbers using standard and non-standard algorithms.

outcome.title: Divisibility Statements
outcome.description: I can identify divisibility statements as true or false.

outcome.title: Testing for Prime or Not Prime
outcome.description: I can determine if a number is prime or composite via the prime testing method.

outcome.title: Finding the GCD
outcome.description: I can compute the greatest common divisor (GCD) of two numbers using the listing and prime factorization methods.

outcome.title: Finding the LCM
outcome.description: I can compute the least common multiple (LCM) of two numbers using the listing and prime factorization methods.

outcome.title: Equivalent Fractions
outcome.description: I can convert fractions to different forms (including simplest form), and determine if two fractions are equivalent.

outcome.title: Modeling Fractions
outcome.description: I can construct both number line and area models for fractions.

outcome.title: Exemplifying the Denseness Property
outcome.description: I can, given two rational numbers, find any number of rational numbers between them and, in the case of decimals, place these numbers accurately on a number line.

outcome.title: Basic Operations with Mixed Numbers
outcome.description: I can compute the sum, difference, product, and quotient of mixed numbers.

outcome.title: Decimal Place Values
outcome.description: I can identify place values in decimal numbers using both numerical notation and English words, and represent decimal numbers using base-ten blocks.

outcome.title: Decimal Conversions
outcome.description: I can convert numbers between fractions, decimals, and percents.
